summary: A small mod with a huge impact on the proportions of the wings of dragons.  Vanilla dragon wings are just too small  to be able to realistically lift a dragon into the air.  This mod enhances the skeleton to give dragons flight worthy wings! Guarantied to increase your immersion 101%
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#00ff00][size=5][b]﻿[ [ [Mod Author [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/20882614]Rougeshot[/url]﻿ ] ] ][/b][/size][/color]

[color=#d9ead3][size=4][b]Hello fellow modders, I'm Rougeshot and I'm open to[/b][b] any feedback or[/b][b] constructive criticism you may have, but keep in mind that I have a full time career and am in college part time, so it may be a while before I can respond to any comments or questions you may have.  Please be patient with any questions or concerns and I will respond as soon as I am able. 

[/b][/size][/color][b][size=4][color=#d9ead3]﻿And if you enjoy the mod hit that [/color][color=#00ff00]thumbs up[/color][color=#d9ead3] button so that your fellow modders will have an easier time finding this mod among the thousands of others.
[/color][/size][/b][b]
[/b][b][color=#00ff00][size=4]Thank you so much for your support.[/size][/color][/b][size=4]﻿



[/size][size=6][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/18957/]IMMERSIVE DRAGONS SPECIAL EDITION[/url]﻿[/b][/size]



[size=4][color=#00ff00][b]I've been simply blown away by the Nexus community,
thank you so much for getting "Immersive Dragons" on to the Hot Mods! [/b][/color]
[/size]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92795/92795-1533564165-2006991199.jpeg[/img]﻿
[size=6]


[/size][b][color=#00ffff][size=6][ [ [ MOD DESCRIPTION] ] ][/size][/color]
[size=5]
[/size][/b][b][size=5]If your like me and have been disappointed with the vanilla dragons, then this mod is for you. This mod replaces the vanilla skeleton with a custom skeleton that increases the wing size of vanilla dragons, to give them a wing size that could actually lift them into the air. This mod has kept compatibility in mind, dragon riding, combat and kill move animations should still work perfectly.
[/size]

[/b][b][color=#00ff00][size=5]SEEING IS BELIEVING!!!

[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#00ff00][size=5]DIRECT COMPARISON!!![/size][/color][/b][b][color=#00ff00][size=5]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92795/92795-1532922303-1840567480.jpeg[/img]﻿
[/size][/color][/b][/center][color=#00ff00][size=5][center] 
﻿[b]LEFT SIDE IMMERSIVE DRAGONS [/b][b]VS. [/b][b]RIGHT SIDE VANILLA DRAGONS
[/b][/center][b][center]This replaces all dragons in game!


Images provided by the talented [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/15677264]Limbic2Node[/url]﻿

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92795/92795-1532965081-815521047.png[/img]﻿


[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92795/92795-1532965049-1283799912.png[/img]﻿[/center][/b][center]﻿

[b]A Fantastic Video provided by the gracious[/b] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4425147?tab=about+me]chaodynn[/url]﻿ 

[youtube]BFezWDx7azU[/youtube]



[b]"Immersive Dragons" on MXR Mods!!!

[youtube]crQK-s7W-lw[/youtube][/b]
﻿[/center]
[center][b]"Immersive Dragons" featured by Ikari Skyrim Mods﻿!!![/b]

[youtube]dAYn59uLjCY[/youtube][/center]


[/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=6][center][b][ [ [ MOD COMPATIBILITY] ] ] [/b][/center][/size][/color]

[size=5][b]Immersive Dragons uses a custom skeleton for the vanilla Dragons and will overwrite any mod that makes changes to the vanilla Dragon skeleton.  Mods that make sweeping changes to vanilla skeletons e.g."Realistic Ragdoll and Force" [/b][color=#ffff00][b]should be compatible as long as "Immersive Dragons" is installed after those mods and allowed to overwrite their files.[/b][/color]

[b][color=#ffff00]Should be fully compatible with any texture mods, since this mod contains no textures of it's own only a skeleton.  Which also makes it compatible with most other Dragon mods that do not edit vanilla Dragon skeletons.[/color][/b]

[/size][b][center][size=5]Here are just a few that I know are compatible.

[color=#1e84cc] [/color][color=#1e84cc]Immersive creatures[/color] - [color=#00ff00]Compatible
[/color]
[color=#1e84cc]Monster Mod[/color][color=#ffff00] [/color][color=#00ff00]- [/color][/size][size=5][color=#00ff00]Compatible[/color]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3829]Deadly Dragons[/url]﻿ [color=#00ff00]- Compatible[/color]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83543]Splendor[/url]﻿ [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83543]- Dragon Variants[/url]﻿ [color=#00ff00]- Compatible[/color]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83559]Diverse Dragons Collection[/url]﻿ [color=#00ff00]- Compatible[/color]

[/size][size=5][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55206/]ULTIMATE DRAGONS[/url]﻿ [color=#00ff00]- Compatible

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91469]KS DRAGON Overhaul[/url]﻿ - Compatible[/color]

[/size]

[color=#ffff00][size=5]Typically any mod that resizes the dragons will be incompatibl[/size][b][size=5]e.
[/size][/b][/color][/center][/b][b][center][color=#fce5cd][size=5]
Here are the incompatible mods 

[/size][/color][size=5][color=#a4c2f4]Dragons Res[/color][b][b][color=#a4c2f4]ized[/color] [color=#ff7700]- Incompatible
[/color][/b][/b][/size][/center][/b][b][center]



[b][color=#00ffff][size=6][ [ [ INSTALLATION ] ] ][/size][/color][/b][color=#00ff00]

[/color][size=5][b]Recommend using Nexus Mod Manager or your favorite mod manager.

[/b][/size][b][size=5][color=#fce5cd]Install my mod[/color][color=#ffff00][u] after[/u] [/color][color=#fce5cd]any mod that makes changes to the vanilla Dragons and[/color][color=#ff7700] [/color][color=#ffff00][u]click "Yes to all"[/u][/color][color=#fce5cd] [/color][u][color=#ffff00]when prompted to overwrite any files[/color][/u][color=#fce5cd].[/color]
[/size][color=#fce5cd][size=5]There is no ".esp" plugin with this mod.



[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#00ffff][size=6][ [ [ MY OTHER MODS] ] ][/size][/color][/b][b][color=#fce5cd][size=5]
[/size][/color][/b][/center][/b][b][color=#00ffff][size=6][center]
[b][size=5]If you like this mod then I'm sure you'll enjoy my other mods. [/size]
